name: repost-button-avatars
title: Repost Button Avatars
oneLiner: A avatars button for repost content

apiDoc.name: RepostButtonAvatars
apiDoc.description: Repost button with avatar group display. When clicked without custom onclick handler, it toggles the repost state. Shows avatars of users who have reposted the content.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance (optional if available in context)

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum number of avatars to display before showing overflow

props.name: avatarSize
props.description: Size of each avatar in pixels

props.name: spacing
props.description: Spacing between avatars in the group

props.name: showCount
props.description: Whether to show repost count alongside avatars

props.name: onclick
props.description: Optional custom click handler. If not provided, clicking will toggle repost state (repost/unrepost)
